81 
82 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
83 void testCheckBalancingInitByDisablingBalancing(void) {
84  DATA_BLOCK_BALANCING_CONTROL_s *pBalancing = TEST_BAL_GetBalancingControl();
85  pBalancing->enableBalancing = 1;
86  DATA_Read1DataBlock_IgnoreAndReturn(STD_OK);
87  DATA_Write1DataBlock_IgnoreAndReturn(STD_OK);
88  BAL_Init(pBalancing);
89  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0, pBalancing->enableBalancing);
90 }
91 
92 void testBalancingGetState(void) {
93  BAL_STATE_s *balancingState = TEST_BAL_GetBalancingState();
94  balancingState->state = BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED;
95  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(BAL_STATEMACH_UNINITIALIZED, BAL_GetState());
96  balancingState->state = BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZED;
97  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(BAL_STATEMACH_INITIALIZED, BAL_GetState());
98 }
99 
100 void testBalancingFinished(void) {
101  BAL_STATE_s *balancingState = TEST_BAL_GetBalancingState();
102  balancingState->initializationFinished = STD_NOT_OK;
103  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(STD_NOT_OK, BAL_GetInitializationState());
104  balancingState->initializationFinished = STD_OK;
105  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(STD_OK, BAL_GetInitializationState());
106 }
